title: The Innocent eye
creator_credit: John Schlesinger, Peter Newington and BBC-TV
brief_description: Studies the imagination of young children as disclosed in their art. Children paint their own experiences; trains, family occasions, TV serials, country holidays.
description: Studies the imagination of young children as disclosed in their art. Children paint their own experiences; trains, family occasions, TV serials, country holidays.
